text: Diggah sin Rabbi yallay qaranwaa kee baaxó lica ayróh addat gine kinni, tohuk lakal Usuk Qarshi amol isi celta fayyah fayya iyye isi ginô caagiida bicisak, Qhiyaamah ayró hebeltô numuy shafaaqatta aba mayan, shafaaqattah idini Yalli kaah yeceek lakal akke waytek, toh Yallaay sin Rabbik kaa uqbuda, tokkel isin ama aayootaa kee tama sumaqwal makaskassowtaanaa
